HMH_warning_desc: Some of your changes may not take effect until the next heist restart!
no_menu_textures_desc:
This will delete the menu textures from the mod_overrides.
When changed, a texture refresh is required to take effect.
mod_overrides_desc:
This will disable the update notificaton for the Menu Textures.
When changed, a game restart is required to take effect.
mod_font_desc:
Enables the custom pixel font.
When changed, a texture refresh is required to take effect.
preset_warning: CHANGING PRESETS WILL RESET ALL SETTINGS!
restart_preset_title: RESTART IS REQUIRED FOR THE PRESET TO CHANGE
refresh_desc:
This will apply any texture changes that have been made.
For example font or health texture changes.

Note: Will be disabled when in a heist if the hud is scaled down.
hmh_skip_menu_options_title: Auto Menu Skip And Card Select
skip_blackscreen_desc: Automatically skips the blackscreen on mission start.
skip_xp_desc: Proceeds X seconds, after your EXP got counted.
pick_card_desc: Automatically pick a card, when the loot screen is displayed
skip_card_desc: Proceeds X seconds, after the cards have been picked.
crew_loadout_desc: Adds a button to your Lobby screen, that can display the loadout of you and your crew.
crew_loadout_briefing_desc: Replaces the default Crew Loadout Panel in Mission briefing.
no_confirm_desc: Remove some of the >Are you sure< messages when navigating menus.
inventory_amount_desc: Displays the amount of deployables/grenades in the inventory.
custom_menu_background_desc:
Choose what background to use.
When changed, a texture refresh is required to take effect.
menu_color_desc: Enable the custom menu text colors.
no_smoke_desc:
Disables the smoke in the main menu.
When changed, a texture refresh is required to take effect.
mouse_pointer_desc:
Choose what mouse pointer to use.
When changed, a texture refresh is required to take effect.
custom_filter_desc: This will disable the default blue menu color filter. The menu color grading can be changed in the games video options under advanced settings.
combo_kill_anim_desc: Animate the counter for each kill.
combo_kill_flash_desc: Flash the combo text for each kill.
combo_desc: Enable a hotline miami styled combo counter.
panel_position_desc: Change the vertical position of the combo counter.
infoboxes_desc: Enable an ECM timer in stealth.
pager_jam_title: Only Display ECM Timers With Pager Delay
pager_jam_desc: Hides ECM timers that don't delay pagers.
pocket_ecm_desc: Include pocket ECMs in the ECM timer.
hide_hudbox_desc: The hudbox corners and background will always be hidden even when the rest of the assault panel options are disabled.
pink_corner_desc: Makes the corners of hud elements pink.
hmh_hud_desc: Options related to you and your teammates' hud panels.
health_texture_desc:
Enable a custom health texture (The pixel heart may cause issues with some perkdecks).
When changed, a texture refresh is required to take effect.
downed_desc: Enable the colored downed text at the top of the screen.
custody_desc: Enable the colored custody text when taken into custody(civillian killed/time).
downed_text_desc: Choose a value for how translucent the downed text will be.
custody_text_desc: Choose a value for how translucent the custody text will be.
trueammo_desc: Shows ammo left, not taking the rounds in your current magazine into account.
bulletstorm_desc: Display a infinite symbol on the ammo when bulletstorm or swan song is active.
armorer_timer_desc: Displays a timer counting down the cooldown for the invulnerability (Anarchist/Armorer/Copycat).
armorer_radial_desc: Shows the duration of the invulnerability period (Anarchist/Armorer/Copycat).
screen_effect_desc: Will make the screen flash when swan song or the kingpin injector is active.
stealth_c4_desc:
When checked, you need to doubletap to deploy shaped charges in stealth. 
Only to prevent accidents.
ping_desc: Displays the players ping by their name panels.
stamina_desc: Display a stamina circle in the hud.
stop_ai_desc: Use a custom ai stop symbol.
hmh_tab_and_subs_desc: Options related to the tabstats panel and subtitle text.
enemy_count_desc: Shows the amount of enemies on the map.
loot_count_desc: Shows the amount of loot on the map.
crew_loadout_tab_desc: Displays the Skills, Perk and current Ping of players in your lobby.
sub_text_desc: Choose a value for how translucent the subtitles text will be.
hmh_waypoints_and_detection_desc: Options related to waypoints and the stealth detection panel.
waypoint_alpha_desc: Choose a value for how translucent the waypoint markers will be.
greenciv_desc: Civilians that are pacified will have a green ! marker above them.
suspicion_desc:
Adds a custom colored Detection meter.
When changed, a texture refresh is required to take effect.
hmh_objective_and_timer_desc: Options related to the heist timer and objectives panels.
timer_desc: Enable the custom colored heist timer.
timer_text_desc: Choose a value for how translucent the timer text will be.
objective_desc: Enable the custom colored objective panel.
objective_text_desc: Choose a value for how translucent the objective text will be.
presenter_desc: Enable the custom colored presenter panel.
present_text_desc: Choose a value for how translucent the presenter text will be.
silent_obj_desc: Replaces the objective sound with silence.
hint_desc: Enable the custom colored hint text.
inspire_desc: Displays a hint message with the remaining cooldown time.
hint_text_desc: Choose a value for how translucent the hint text will be.
hmh_inspire_cooldown_text: Inspire still has a cooldown of
hmh_interact_and_carry_desc: Options related to the interaction panel and the bag carry panel.
interact_desc: Enable the custom colored interaction text.
interact_texture_desc:
Choose what Interaction Texture to use.
When changed, a texture refresh is required to take effect.
interact_icons_desc:
Enable the custom colored interaction icons (saw, picklock, c4 and etc).
When changed, a texture refresh or a restart is required to take effect.
interact_text_desc: Choose a value for how translucent the interaction text will be.
animate_text_desc: Enable the flashing text when carrying bags.
colored_carry_text_desc: Matches the carrying text with the current player color.
carry_value_desc: Display the value of the loot being carried.
carry_text_desc: Choose a value for how translucent the carrying text will be.
hmh_assault_desc: Options related to the assault panel.
assault_text_desc: Choose a value for how translucent the assault text will be.
info_box_desc: Choose a value for how translucent the assault text will be.
assault_desc: Enable the custom flashing assault panel.
captain_buff_desc: Shows damage reduction level when Captain is present. (1 = 10% | 5 = 50%)
hmh_joining_player_options_desc: Options related to the joining drop-in clients panel.
show_rank_desc: Displays the level and rank of players that are joining mid game.
extracted_preplanning_save_tooltip_desc: Save your current Plan, and have an easier time next time on this mission.
extracted_preplanning_load_tooltip_desc: Opens a menu with all your saved plans.
extracted_preplanning_reset_tooltip_desc: Removes all your assets from the current plan, as well as your votes.
extracted_preplanning_reset_all_tooltip_: Removes everyones assets from the current plan, as well as your votes.
extracted_preplanning_delete_tooltip_des: Clean up your saved plans and delete a few.
extracted_preplanning_error_max_plans_re: Maximum amount of saved Plans reached.
extracted_preplanning_dialog_save_desc:
$PLAN


Please enter a name for this plan.
(Using an existing name will overwrite that plan.)
extracted_preplanning_dialog_delete_desc: Are you sure you want to delete Plan '$NAME'?
extracted_preplanning_msg_saved_failed: An error occurred while saving plan.
extracted_preplanning_msg_no_save_slot: Maximum amount of saved Plans reached.
extracted_preplanning_msg_no_current_pla: You have nothing planned, that can be saved.
extracted_preplanning_msg_loaded_failed: An error occurred while loading plan.
extracted_preplanning_msg_reseted_failed: An error occurred while resetting current plan.
extracted_preplanning_msg_deleted_failed: An error occurred while deleting saved plan.
extracted_preplanning_msg_folder_creatio:
Failed to create folder: $FOLDER 
Please make sure the game has the required permissions or create it manually.
extracted_preplanning_msg_file_creation_:
Failed to create file: $FILE 
Please make sure the game has the required permissions or create it manually.
HotlineMiamiHudColorOption: Change the color of this HUD element to your own liking.
